subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Pippa Mann plans to race in the Indianapolis 500 on May 26, her first race since she was injured in the 2011 IndyCar crash that killed Dan Wheldon.
snippet: Pippa Mann plans to race in the Indianapolis 500 on May 26, her first race since she was injured in the 2011 IndyCar crash that killed Dan Wheldon.
